name: Bloodlines of Prima
description:
Infinite power.
Unlimited wealth.
Eternal life.

Those brave enough to conquer the untamed primordial lands will be richly rewarded should they unearth what legend claims is hidden there. Tread carefully. If you die, you lose everything.

Bloodlines of Prima is a FPS Rogue-lite Multiplayer game, set in a land overwhelmed by mysterious elemental forces. You are in search of the Prima Materia, the key to creating the legendary Philospher’s Stone.

  • Mix and match hundreds of different abilities to achieve your goals.
  • Collect essences of your slain enemies to reinforce the base camp, unlocking new buildings and services, summon bosses or buy powerful equipment for your character.
  • Help your server to progress and conquer challenges before other servers do.
  • Unlock bank access to save your most precious treasures from being pillaged from your dead body.
  • Explore a huge, diverse environment dominated by strong elemental enemies.
  • Upgrade your equipment, craft consumables to increase your power, or transmute your accessories to augment your abilities.

The more you explore and conquer, the more powerful your Bloodline becomes.
